explains: v. 使减少到最低限度；贬低，使显得不重要；（尤指在计算机屏幕上）使最小化

sentences.en: Minimize any windows you have opened.
sentences.cn: 把你打开的所有窗口最小化。

sentences.en: Good hygiene helps to minimize the risk of infection.
sentences.cn: 保持清洁有助于最大限度地减少感染的危险。

sentences.en: To minimize collateral damage, maximum precision in bombing was required.
sentences.cn: 为使附带损害达到最小，要求在轰炸中使精确度达到最高。
